Posts.Content:
Hello, 
this is my first post. I hope that you can help me and that I can help you with your problems in return. 
I have a breast lump, and I first felt it over 2 years ago. It is over one cm long. Under my nipple area, and if I squeeze the breast, I can see it.
It is rather hard, and has not grown much in size since I first felt it. I am 25.
I am afraid that it might be cancer. Yet I cannot go to the Gyn. I have never been there. Whenever I try to go to one, I panic and leave. The older I get the harder it becomes, because clearly it is rather disgusting that I've never been to one. 
What can I do?
Posts.Title: I am afraid of going to the gyn
